text: China Civil Affairs University (Chinese: 民政职业大学) is a public university located in Beijing, China. It is affiliated with the Ministry of Civil Affairs of the People's Republic of China. == Academics == The university runs 25 undergraduate majors, including smart healthcare management, nursing, social work and modern funeral management. It has the country's first undergraduate program in marriage. == References == Category:Colleges and universities in Beijing
title: China Civil Affairs University
